description.value:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to create a minor figment. This can function as either @Compendium[pf1.spells.mtxqp85izkb20djq]{Ghost Sound} or @Compendium[pf1.spells.27o3msobhyghmfid]{Minor Image}. In either case, the effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your occultist level.

If you are 7th level or higher, the figment lasts for a number of minutes equal to your occultist level, and you can cause the figment to change once during its duration when a specified condition occurs.
